title: MUS 511
intro: Introduction to the field for graduate students in musicology. Includes a study of bibliographic resources and techniques; on-line and CD ROM resources; database creation and management; basic historical method; evidence and argumentation in historical research; critical reading and logical analysis; and the nature and taxonomy of musical sources. Students begin a project on the state of research on a particular subject of their choice, which is to be completed in MUS 512.
